Documentation.TagDescription:
**Product Catalog**

Access the product catalog with basic item information. Query by assortment, search descriptions, and retrieve item details for integration with external systems.

> [!IMPORTANT]
> This endpoint doesn't and will never include complex price information.

MethodDocumentation.GET: You can retrieve **all items** in the `product catalog`, including their essential details. This includes current, archived, and upcoming product offerings.
